infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Face ID is used to securely log you into the WON Digi app, ensuring only you can access your profile and personal data.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: We access your contacts to help you easily share billing details and enable contact-based service management features within the WON Digi platform.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photo library so you can upload a profile picture and attach images to your class notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We access your photo library so you can upload a profile picture and attach images to your class notes.
infoPlist.NSDocumentPickerUsageDescription: We access your files so you can upload PDFs, Excel sheets, and other documents to your class notes.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to let you take photos for profile pictures or notes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We need access to your microphone for recording audio-based notes or video features.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to provide location-based services, such as mapping, route tracking, and nearby resource discovery within the WON Digi app.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use your location in the background to support continuous tracking and provide seamless service delivery even when the app is not in the foreground.
